other_tests.findings: Mild bibasilar atelectasis, small bilateral pleural effusions, small scattered hypodensities throughout the liver, layered high attenuation material in the gallbladder lumen, inflammatory changes and subcutaneous air in the subcutaneous soft tissues, significant reduction in inflammatory changes and phlegmon in the right lower abdomen and pelvis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Significant reduction in the extent of inflammatory changes and phlegmon in the right lower abdomen and pelvis since ___.
